title: Work - work done by gravity and normal force

content.description: Which of the following correctly describes the work <math alttext="W sub g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>g</mi></msub></mstyle></math> done by the gravitational force and the work <math alttext="W sub N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>N</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> done by the normal force on the system consisting of only the block as the block moves up the incline?
content.question: <math alttext="W sub g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mi>g</mi></msub></mstyle></math><math alttext="W sub N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>N</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>ANegativeZeroBNegativeNegativeCZeroZeroDZeroNegative

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
